metadata.title: CVE-2017-9049 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
libxml2 20904-GITv2.9.4-16-g0741801 is vulnerable to a heap-based bufferover-read in the xmlDictComputeFastKey function in dict.c. Thisvulnerability causes programs that use libxml2, such as PHP, to crash. Thisvulnerability exists because of an incomplete fix for libxml2 Bug 759398.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-9049` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libxml2 - 2.9.3+dfsg1-1ubuntu0.3
libxml2-utils - 2.9.3+dfsg1-1ubuntu0.3
python-libxml2 - 2.9.3+dfsg1-1ubuntu0.3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libxml2 package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.9.3+dfsg1-1ubuntu0.3').
